unnormalised: Inventory forecasting is becoming increasingly critical for Indian manufacturers navigating dynamic market conditions. Dr. Anjali Sharma from IIT-Delhi emphasizes its importance in minimizing holding costs and preventing stockouts. Accurate forecasts help companies like Tata Steel optimize production schedules and warehousing needs.
